snippet: The stock of AbTech Industries has fallen more than 70 percent since reports in April that it was entangled in a scandal involving Mr. Skelos, who has resigned as leader of the New York State Senate.
abstract: Abtech Holdings Inc's stock falls sharply after reports that it was entangled in scandal involving former New York State Sen Dean G Skelos and his son Adam.

byline.contributor: Ben Protess and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The stock of AbTech Industries has fallen more than 70 percent since reports in April that it was entangled in a scandal involving Mr. Skelos, who has resigned as leader of the New York State Senate.

headline.main: Albany Corruption Inquiry Hurts Arizona Company That Hired Dean Skelos’s Son
headline.print_headline: Corruption Inquiry Hurts Firm That Hired Skelos’s Son
